sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> carries a <radical>husband</radical> and his <radical>husband</radical> up into the <radical>sun</radical>, where they're going to <kanji>conceal</kanji> something.
meaningInfo: Imagine the tsunami taking the two husbands up into the sun. Hear the water gushing. That tsunami is gigantic. What are they going to conceal in the sun?
readingMnemonic: The husbands are going to <kanji>conceal</kanji> their pet <reading>cen</reading>taur (<ja>せん</ja>) in the sun. The local government isn’t too pleased that they have a pet centaur so they have to conceal it in the sun so it doesn't get confiscated.
readingInfo: Just make sure to remember there is a centaur up on that tsunami with the husbands, heading towards the sun. They need to conceal the centaur to keep it safe.
